name: Path of Pride
description: In this Balloon-Fight styled adventure, take up arms as a Knight of Massona. Recent events have seen Massona’s ace fighter and commander, known as The Patriot, missing in action. With Massona under threat of invasion from neighboring kingdoms, the King assigns you the task of travelling around the land in search of The Patriot. Float and fight your way through the armies and monarchs of each kingdom, and locate the Patriot before Massona’s border is breached and the kingdom is lost.
